title: Roblox
short_plot_summary: Roblox is a multiplayer online platform where users create and play games designed by other players, customize their avatar, and explore various virtual worlds.
explanation: A hammer, symbolizing the game's building and creation aspect
Two people, representing the multiplayer and social features of the game
A house, illustrating the ability to create and design various structures within the game
A gem, indicating the in-game currency, Robux, which can be used to purchase items and avatar accessories
A roller coaster, portraying the wide variety of game genres and experiences available within Roblox
